Name: Cham 69 #2
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne, stir and serve with straws.
History: Created in 2005 by yours truly after re-examining my original Cham 69 creation. I decided champagne would be more appropriate considering the name.
Nutrition: One serving of Cham 69 #2 contains 175 calories
